alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sheridan County through 530 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hay Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rushville, Hay Springs, Clinton, Highway 250 crossing the Niobrara River, Intersection of Highway 87 and Antelope Road and Walgren Lake State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 79 and 97. Highway 250 between mile markers 38 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
